name: Mathew Leonardi
title: Associate Professor, Obstetrics & Gynecology
overview: Dr. Mathew Leonardi M.D., Ph.D. is an academic minimally invasive gynecologic surgeon and sonologist. He is an avid researcher. He completed his Ph.D. at the University of Sydney, Australia focused on the utility of ultrasound in the diagnosis and surgical management of endometriosis. He is currently involved with a variety of local and multicentre international projects on endometriosis, ranging from studies on pathophysiology to assessment of surgical outcomes.
